QuestData.Title: A New Fate
QuestData.Description: $n, I'm thankful the plan worked, but just barely. We would be sinking to the bottom of the ocean with all of Shen-zin Su if you hadn't been here. I don't think I can ever forgive Ji for this kind of recklessness.$B$BThere will be plenty of time for reflection, but for now, we need to return to the Temple of Five Dawns. We need to let them know that Shen-zin Su has been saved, and we need to sort out the fates of these new allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the Temple of Five Dawns. A cart is waiting near the Skyfire Crash-Site to take you there.
